xqdoc:module.xqdoc:name: rest.xqm

xqdoc:description.p: Library to support html5 rendering of xqdoc

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:restxq
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %Q{https://github.com/Quodatum/xqdoca}global("restxq", "Summary of REST interface") %Q{https://github.com/Quodatum/xqdoca}output("restxq.html", "html5") function _:restxq($model as item()*, $opts as item()*) as item()*

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:summary
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function _:summary($model as item()*, $opts as item()*, $tree as item()*) as element(div)

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: html for a path $rep={uri:.., methods:{METHOD:annotation}, function:..}

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:path-report
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function _:path-report($rep as map(*), $pos as item()*) as element(div)

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:method
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function _:method($method as xs:string, $amap as map(*), $rep as map(*)) as element(div)

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:url-params
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function _:url-params($url as xs:string, $amap as map(*)) as element()*

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:outputs
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function _:outputs($annots as element(xqdoc:annotation)*, $amap as map(*)) as element()*

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:toc
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function _:toc($model as map(*), $tree as item()*) as element(nav)
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:body:
function _:toc($model as map(*),$tree) as element(nav) {

{ $model?project } / RestXQ

Contents

  1. 1 Summary
  2. 2 Rest Paths
    3. { $tree/*/*!page:tree-list(.,(2,position()),_:toc-render#2,1) }
}

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:toc-render
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function _:toc-render($pos as xs:string, $el as element()) as element()*

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:annotations
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function _:annotations($annots as element(xqdoc:annotation)*) as element()
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:body:
function _:annotations($annots as element(xqdoc:annotation)*) as element(*) {
Annotations { for $a in $annots return }
%{ $a/@name/string() } { xqa:literals($a/xqdoc:literal) }
}

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: _:params
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function _:params($annots as element(xqdoc:annotation)*, $name as xs:string, $title as xs:string, $amap as map(*)) as element()*
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:body:
function _:params($annots as element(xqdoc:annotation)*, $name as xs:string, $title as xs:string, $amap as map(*)) as element(*)* { let $aq:=filter($annots,xqa:is-rest($name,?,$amap?file?prefixes)) return if($aq) then (
{ $title }
,
{for $a in $aq let $p:=$a/xqdoc:literal/string() let $name:=xqa:extract-restxq($p[2]) let $fn:=$amap?annot/../.. let $desc:=page:comment-for($name,$fn/xqdoc:parameters) let $type:=$fn/xqdoc:parameters/xqdoc:parameter[xqdoc:name=$name]/xqdoc:type/concat(.,@occurrence) return }
NameTypeDescriptionDefault
{$p[1]} { $type} { $desc } {$p[3]}
) else () }
